title: URGENT.. jolly ranchers logo font?
content:
can anyone tell me what this font is / where i can get it??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002426im_/http:/typophile.com/files/89705be197dd9078874560322bcd197b_4657.11206.jpeg)
author: riceah

comments.content:
most likely a custom mark, not a font.

but if you google

"jolly rancher" and "font"

you'll see that someone made this into a font.
i think i found what you were talking about.. but the site is blocked on my work computer, and i need it now... do you know if there is any other way i could get it??

Well if it's for a business need surely you can talk your employer into letting you access the site, download the font and install it on your work machine...although I'm scratching my head about a business reason for wanting to make something look like Jolly Rancher.

Thank you Brian, but we had that here before, I think.  
BTW, wonderful portfolio on your website. THAT is awesome.
